section.title: Description
section.p: This class represents the total of the values associated with a defined subset of the Assessment. Some Assessment Instruments define a intermediate score(s) for related characteristics along with a total score for the overall instrument. For example, an overall mental health Assessment instrument may define a sub-score for depression. Note that many Assessment Instruments contain groupings or sections, which are not necessarily related to sub-scores.

stentry.p: Identifes the domain or concept that is measured by the subscore.
This attribute holds the numeric value of the subscore.
